participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jordan enjoys deep conversations and has a passion for understanding human behavior.
participant_1.background: i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker.

participant_2.name: Alex Parker
participant_2.personality: Energetic and socially conscious, Alex is always looking for ways to make a positive impact in the world.
participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i'm a feminist. i have solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet.
